paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information related to the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: age range 30-70 years, mixed sex, predominantly African descent
patients.phenotype: ATTRv-CM with varying degrees of cardiac involvement

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient P1 developed heart failure symptoms at age 32.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with ATTRv-CM with significant cardiac involvement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Patient P2 was diagnosed with ATTRv-CM at age 43.
Patient P3 remains asymptomatic despite being a carrier.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays indicated that the p.Val10Ile variant leads to destabilization of the TTR tetramer.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with late-onset disease.
key_quotes: The replacement of the amino acid Val with Met at position 30 is associated with a late onset of disease.
Hereditary ATTRv-CM is associated with more than 110 TTR mutations.

tables_processed.table_caption: Summary of TTR variants and their clinical significance

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR gene variants were extracted successfully.
